name: CSA Dev Container
initializeCommand: bash -lc 'cd ..; if [ ! -f .env ] && [ -f env.gitpod ]; then cp env.gitpod .env; echo "[init] Copied env.gitpod -> .env"; fi'
postCreateCommand: mkdir -p /workspace/lang-java-springboot && /usr/local/bin/ensure-plantuml-into-workspace && if [ -f requirements.txt ]; then pip install -r requirements.txt; fi
